youAreAboutToReset:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the account reset confirmation modal
**UI Location**: Reset Account modal (header)
**When Users See This**: When attempting to reset their Exercism account
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "You're about to reset your Exercism account"
pleaseReadCarefully:
**Functional Purpose**: Instruction to read warning carefully
**UI Location**: Reset Account modal
**When Users See This**: When attempting to reset their Exercism account
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "Please read this carefully before commiting to reset your account."
allSolutionsSubmitted:
**Functional Purpose**: List item detailing what will be lost upon account reset
**UI Location**: Reset Account modal (list item)
**When Users See This**: When reviewing the consequences of resetting their account
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "All solutions you have submitted"
allMentoringReceived:
**Functional Purpose**: List item detailing what will be lost upon account reset
**UI Location**: Reset Account modal (list item)
**When Users See This**: When reviewing the consequences of resetting their account
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "All mentoring you have received"
allMentoringGiven:
**Functional Purpose**: List item detailing what will be lost upon account reset
**UI Location**: Reset Account modal (list item)
**When Users See This**: When reviewing the consequences of resetting their account
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "All mentoring you have given and any testimonials received."
anyReputationEarned:
**Functional Purpose**: List item detailing what will be lost upon account reset
**UI Location**: Reset Account modal (list item)
**When Users See This**: When reviewing the consequences of resetting their account
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "Any reputation you have earned through mentoring or publishing solutions."
cancel:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to close the modal and cancel the account reset
**UI Location**: Reset Account modal (button)
**When Users See This**: When deciding not to proceed with account reset
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "Cancel"
resetAccount:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to submit the account reset request
**UI Location**: Reset Account modal (button)
**When Users See This**: When confirming the account reset after entering their handle
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "Reset account"
unableToResetAccount:
**Functional Purpose**: Error message when account reset fails
**UI Location**: Reset Account modal (error message)
**When Users See This**: If the account reset mutation encounters an error
**Technical Context**: Used as a default error message when `error` is not defined.
**Current English**: "Unable to reset account"
